oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Control of a high index DAE system through a linear control law
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VORA, P
MOUDGALYA, KM
PANI, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Linear controller design of DAE systems developed by [1]. is extended to nonlinear systems. This methodology is applied to an index-2 two phase reactor [2] to arrive at a 2 x 2 transfer function matrix. A PI controller derived using Ziegler-Nichols and BLT methods [3] is found to work well. Considering the advantages, this method should belong to the toolkit of control engineers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 2002 AMERICAN CONTROL CONFERENCE, VOLS 1-6,465-470
